languages.text: {n}Голоса затихают — а затем сливаются в один, звенящий и гипнотизирующий.{/n} "Эта галактика — забытая арена древней битвы. Битвы, в коей сироты Принца сошлись против могущественного наместника Владений Колдуна, воплощения воли Ткача Судеб в реальном мире — нами. В тот раз битва окончилась нашим поражением. Мы должны были вернуться в чертоги Ткача... но смертные обманули судьбу".

{n}The voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is an ancient, forgotten battlefield, where the Prince's orphans once stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Realm of the Sorcerer, the embodiment of the Weaver's will in realspace: us. The battle ended with our defeat. We were fated to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed that destiny."
languages.original_text: {n}Голоса затихают — а затем сливаются в один, звенящий и гипнотизирующий.{/n} "Эта галактика — забытая арена древней битвы. Битвы, в коей сироты Принца сошлись против могущественного наместника Владений Колдуна, воплощения воли Ткача Судеб в реальном мире — нами. В тот раз битва окончилась нашим поражением. Мы должны были вернуться в чертоги Ткача... но смертные обманули судьбу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is a forgotten arena of an ancient battle, a battle in which the Prince's orphans stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Sorcerer's Realm, the embodiment of the Fateweaver's will in the realspace: against us. That time the battle ended with our defeat. We were destined to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed the destiny."

{n}Voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is a forgotten arena of an ancient battle, a battle in which the Prince's orphans stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Sorcerer's Realm, the embodiment of the Fateweaver's will in the realspace: against us. That time the battle ended with our defeat. We were destined to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed the destiny."

{n}The voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is an ancient, forgotten battlefield, where the Prince's Orphans stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Realm of the Sorcerer, the embodiment of the Weaver of Destinies in realspace: us. The battle ended with our defeat. We were fated to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed that destiny."

{n}The voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is an ancient, forgotten battlefield, where the Prince's Orphans stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Realm of the Sorcerer, the embodiment of the Weaver of Destinies in realspace: us. The battle ended with our defeat. We were fated to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed that destiny."

{n}The voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is an ancient, forgotten battlefield, where the Prince's orphans once stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Realm of the Sorcerer, the embodiment of the Weaver's will in realspace: us. The battle ended with our defeat. We were fated to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed that destiny."

languages.text: {n}那些声音安静下来，合而为一。声音清脆、催人入眠。{/n}“银河是个被遗忘的古老战场，王子的遗孤们曾在这里，共同对抗巫师之域某位强大统治者，命运编织者在真实世界中的化身——也就是我们。那场战斗以我们的失败告终，我们本该回到命运编织者的领域……但凡人却改变了我们的命运。”
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is an ancient, forgotten battlefield, where the Prince's orphans once stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Realm of the Sorcerer, the embodiment of the Weaver's will in realspace: us. The battle ended with our defeat. We were fated to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed that destiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}那些声音安静下来，合而为一。声音清脆、催人入眠。{/n}“银河是个被遗忘的古老战场，王子的遗孤们曾在这里，共同对抗巫师之域某位强大统治者，命运编织者在真实世界中的化身——也就是我们。那场战斗以我们的失败告终，我们本该回到命运编织者的领域……但凡人却改变了我们的命运。”

languages.text: {n}Les murmures se taisent puis se fondent en une seule voix, puissante et hypnotique.{/n} « Cette galaxie était jadis un champ de bataille aujourd'hui tombé dans l'oubli. C'est ici que les Orphelins du Prince affrontèrent un puissant vice-roi du royaume du Sorcier, l'incarnation du Tisseur de Destins dans l'espace réel : nous. Le combat se solda par notre défaite. Notre destin était de regagner le royaume du Tisseur... mais des mortels nous en empêchèrent. »
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is an ancient, forgotten battlefield, where the Prince's Orphans stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Realm of the Sorcerer, the embodiment of the Weaver of Destinies in realspace: us. The battle ended with our defeat. We were fated to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed that destiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les murmures se taisent puis se fondent en une seule voix, puissante et hypnotique.{/n} « Cette galaxie était jadis un champ de bataille aujourd'hui tombé dans l'oubli. C'est ici que les Orphelins du Prince affrontèrent un puissant vice-roi du royaume du Sorcier, l'incarnation du Tisseur de Destins dans l'espace réel : nous. Le combat se solda par notre défaite. Notre destin était de regagner le royaume du Tisseur... mais des mortels nous en empêchèrent. »

languages.text: {n}声は静まった後一つに融合し、響き渡り、催眠に誘う。{/n}「この宇宙は、皇子の遺児たちが団結し、リアルスペースにおける運命の織り手の体現たる、ソーサラーの領域の強大な総督、すなわち我々と戦った、古の忘れられた戦場なのだ。戦いは我らの敗北に終わった。我らはウィーヴァーの領域の退却せざるを得なくなった…だが、人間たちがその運命を変えたのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is an ancient, forgotten battlefield, where the Prince's orphans once stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Realm of the Sorcerer, the embodiment of the Weaver's will in realspace: us. The battle ended with our defeat. We were fated to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed that destiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}声は静まった後一つに融合し、響き渡り、催眠に誘う。{/n}「この宇宙は、皇子の遺児たちが団結し、リアルスペースにおける運命の織り手の体現たる、ソーサラーの領域の強大な総督、すなわち我々と戦った、古の忘れられた戦場なのだ。戦いは我らの敗北に終わった。我らはウィーヴァーの領域の退却せざるを得なくなった…だが、人間たちがその運命を変えたのだ」

languages.text: {n}Las voces callan, y luego continúan en un único son, hipnótico y resonante.{/n} «La galaxia es un antiguo campo de batalla en el que los Huérfanos del Príncipe se enfrentaron unidos a un poderoso virrey del Reino del Hechicero, la personificación del Tejedor en el espacio real: nosotros. La batalla terminó con nuestra derrota. Estábamos condenados a volver al reino del Tejedor... pero los mortales cambiaron el destino».
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is an ancient, forgotten battlefield, where the Prince's orphans once stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Realm of the Sorcerer, the embodiment of the Weaver's will in realspace: us. The battle ended with our defeat. We were fated to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed that destiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las voces callan, y luego continúan en un único son, hipnótico y resonante.{/n} «La galaxia es un antiguo campo de batalla en el que los Huérfanos del Príncipe se enfrentaron unidos a un poderoso virrey del Reino del Hechicero, la personificación del Tejedor en el espacio real: nosotros. La batalla terminó con nuestra derrota. Estábamos condenados a volver al reino del Tejedor... pero los mortales cambiaron el destino».

languages.text: {n}Die Stimmen verstummen und verschmelzen dann zu einer, dröhnend und hypnotisierend.{/n} "Diese Galaxie ist ein uraltes, vergessenes Schlachtfeld, auf dem die Waisen des Prinzen zusammen einen mächtigen Vizekönig des Reichs des Hexers bekämpft haben, die Verkörperung des Webers der Schicksale im Realraum: uns. Die Schlacht endete mit unserer Niederlage. Wir waren dazu bestimmt, ins Reich des Webers zurückzukehren ... doch Sterbliche haben dieses Schicksal verändert."
languages.original_text: {n}The voices fall quiet and then merge into one, ringing and hypnotising.{/n} "This galaxy is an ancient, forgotten battlefield, where the Prince's Orphans stood together against a mighty viceroy of the Realm of the Sorcerer, the embodiment of the Weaver of Destinies in realspace: us. The battle ended with our defeat. We were fated to return to the Weaver's realm... but mortals changed that destiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimmen verstummen und verschmelzen dann zu einer, dröhnend und hypnotisierend.{/n} "Diese Galaxie ist ein uraltes, vergessenes Schlachtfeld, auf dem die Waisen des Prinzen zusammen einen mächtigen Vizekönig des Reichs des Hexers bekämpft haben, die Verkörperung des Webers der Schicksale im Realraum: uns. Die Schlacht endete mit unserer Niederlage. Wir waren dazu bestimmt, ins Reich des Webers zurückzukehren ... doch Sterbliche haben dieses Schicksal verändert."
